#summary Files and information related to the code editor SciTE.

= Introduction =

This wiki is a place to share files and information regarding the text editor SciTE. You are welcome to contribute information or links to relevant projects under the appropriate pages.

= Categories =
<font size="4">[Translations]</font> <br/> Display SciTE interface in other languages.
<br/><br/>
<font size="4">[Customization Programming language add-ons]</font> <br/> properties files, api files, other material for computer languages.
<br/><br/>
<font size="4">[http://code.google.com/p/scitedocs/ Documentation and tips]</font> <br/> Collection of SciTE documentation.
<br/><br/>
<font size="4">[Scripts Scripts and macros]</font> <br/> Scripts for text editing, productivity.
<br/><br/>
<font size="4">[CustomBuilds SciTE extensions, modifications, tools]</font> <br/> Patches, custom builds, projects.
<br/><br/>
